00025 #ifndef _GFX_VISUAL_
00026 #define _GFX_VISUAL_
00027 
00028 #include <gfx/gfx>

00030 #include <osg/Node>

00032 
00033 namespace gfx {
00034 
00035 
00036 class Visual
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   typedef Int Attributes;
00040   enum AttributeFlags { ShowAxes=1, ShowBounds=2, ShowCollisions=4, ShowCollisionModel=8, ShowCollisionDetection=16,
00041                         ShowEdges=32, ShowNormals=64, VerticesOnly=128 };
00042 
00043   // Renderer Type identifies the scene graph component Visuals use to construct their graphic
00044   typedef Int VisualType;
00045   const static Int OSGVisual = 1;  // OpenSceneGraph renderer (www.openscenegraph.net)
00046   
00047   virtual bool visualTypeSupported(VisualType type) const { return false; }
00048 
00049   virtual osg::Node* createOSGVisual(Visual::Attributes visualAttributes=0) const
00050     { Logln("OSGVisual not supported."); return NewObj osg::Node(); }
00051 
00052 };
